title: Deadly Gaza Battles, Hezbollah Rockets As War Enters 10th Month
content: Israel carried out deadly air strikes in the Gaza Strip on Sunday as the war entered its 10th month, with fighting raging across the Palestinian territory and fresh diplomatic efforts underway to halt the violence.
summary: Israel carried out deadly air strikes in the Gaza Strip on Sunday as the war entered its 10th month, with fighting raging across the Palestinian territory and fresh diplomatic efforts underway to halt the violence.

title: Overnight Ukraine Drone Hit Sets Russian Munitions Depot Ablaze
content: An overnight Ukrainian drone attack set a Russian munitions depot ablaze the Voronezh region, near the two countries' shared border, Russian and Ukrainian officials said Sunday.
summary: An overnight Ukrainian drone attack set a Russian munitions depot ablaze the Voronezh region, near the two countries' shared border, Russian and Ukrainian officials said Sunday.

title: Need Plan To Control Immigration: Ex UK PM Blair's Advice To Keir Starmer
content: Former Labour prime minister Tony Blair made an early intervention in British politics on Sunday after Keir Starmer's landslide election victory, urging him to have a "plan to control immigration".
summary: Former Labour prime minister Tony Blair made an early intervention in British politics on Sunday after Keir Starmer's landslide election victory, urging him to have a "plan to control immigration".

title: Could Kamala Harris Beat Trump In US Presidential Race? Polls Suggest...
content: She worries Republican donors, has name recognition, and Democratic Party heavyweights are beginning to line up behind her.
summary: She worries Republican donors, has name recognition, and Democratic Party heavyweights are beginning to line up behind her.

title: All Is Not Well Between Prince Harry And Meghan Markle? Expert Says...
content: All is not well between Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.
summary: All is not well between Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle.

title: Elephants Go Out Of Control At Lanka Festival, Pilgrims Flee; 13 Injured
content: A Hindu religious festival in Sri Lanka ended in chaos after an elephant in the procession panicked, with 13 people in the crowd injured as they fled, police said Sunday.
summary: A Hindu religious festival in Sri Lanka ended in chaos after an elephant in the procession panicked, with 13 people in the crowd injured as they fled, police said Sunday.

title: France Votes For Second Round Of Votes In Election As Far Right Eyes Power
content: The mood in the country is tense, with 30,000 police deployed to head off trouble and voters anxious about a potential electoral earthquake shifting the French political landscape.
summary: The mood in the country is tense, with 30,000 police deployed to head off trouble and voters anxious about a potential electoral earthquake shifting the French political landscape.

title: "Democracy Not In Good Health": Pope Francis' Warning To "Populists"
content: Pope Francis decried the state of democracy and warned against "populists" during a short visit to Trieste in Italy's northeast on Sunday ahead of a 12-day trip to Asia -- the longest of his papacy.
summary: Pope Francis decried the state of democracy and warned against "populists" during a short visit to Trieste in Italy's northeast on Sunday ahead of a 12-day trip to Asia -- the longest of his papacy.

title: Sojan Joseph: Mental Health Nurse From Kerala And Now UK's New MP
content: Sojan Joseph, a mental health nurse in the National Health Service (NHS) who migrated from Kerala 22 years ago, is among the new crop of Labour members of Parliament elected to the House of Commons in the UK general election this week.
summary: Sojan Joseph, a mental health nurse in the National Health Service (NHS) who migrated from Kerala 22 years ago, is among the new crop of Labour members of Parliament elected to the House of Commons in the UK general election this week.

title: 14 Killed, 9 Missing After Deadly Floods, Landslides In Nepal
content: Lashing rains in Nepal causing flash floods and landslides have killed at least 14 people across the country, with disaster teams searching for nine missing, police said Sunday.
summary: Lashing rains in Nepal causing flash floods and landslides have killed at least 14 people across the country, with disaster teams searching for nine missing, police said Sunday.

title: Russia Declares Emergency In Some Parts After Ukraine Drone Attack
content: A state of emergency was introduced in parts of Russia's Voronezh region after a Ukrainian drone attack sparked a warehouse fire, the governor of the western region bordering Ukraine said on Sunday.
summary: A state of emergency was introduced in parts of Russia's Voronezh region after a Ukrainian drone attack sparked a warehouse fire, the governor of the western region bordering Ukraine said on Sunday.

title: Spain Introduces 'Porn Passport' To Watch Adult Content Online. Here's Why
content: Citing the data on access to adult content by minors, Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez called it "devastating" and told a Spanish newspaper, "Almost half of young people under 15 years of age consume it".
summary: Citing the data on access to adult content by minors, Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez called it "devastating" and told a Spanish newspaper, "Almost half of young people under 15 years of age consume it".

title: Injection Twice A Year 100% Effective In HIV Treatment: Study
content: A large clinical trial in South Africa and Uganda has shown that a twice-yearly injection of a new pre-exposure prophylaxis drug gives young women total protection from HIV infection.
summary: A large clinical trial in South Africa and Uganda has shown that a twice-yearly injection of a new pre-exposure prophylaxis drug gives young women total protection from HIV infection.

title: "Bulldozed And Shelled": Israel's Assault Ravages Gaza's Farming Sector
content: Tank tracks still fresh on his field in southern Gaza's coastal area of Al-Mawasi, Nedal Abu Jazar lamented the damage war has wrought on his trees and crops.
summary: Tank tracks still fresh on his field in southern Gaza's coastal area of Al-Mawasi, Nedal Abu Jazar lamented the damage war has wrought on his trees and crops.

title: 995 Crore Passwords Stolen In Biggest Data Breach Ever: Report
content: As per the researchers, the passwords have been leaked with the help of a mix of old and new data breaches.
summary: As per the researchers, the passwords have been leaked with the help of a mix of old and new data breaches.

title: Palestine Karate Champion, Who Escaped Gaza, Forges Future In Egypt
content: On October 6, 2023, Palestinian karate champion Mais Elbostami went to bed thrilled after winning a competition in the Gaza Strip. She awoke the next day to a different world.
summary: On October 6, 2023, Palestinian karate champion Mais Elbostami went to bed thrilled after winning a competition in the Gaza Strip. She awoke the next day to a different world.

title: Explained: What Is NATO, How Many Countries Are Part Of It
content: Born at the start of the Cold War, NATO -- the North Atlantic Treaty Organization -- is the world's biggest collective defence grouping with 32 members in Europe and North America.
summary: Born at the start of the Cold War, NATO -- the North Atlantic Treaty Organization -- is the world's biggest collective defence grouping with 32 members in Europe and North America.

title: Joe Biden Invokes "Lord Almighty" Amid Calls To End Reelection Bid
content: Joe Biden on Friday in an ABC News interview refused to commit to an independent medical exam to reassure the public of his mental fitness, even as he insisted he has the stamina to serve another four years.
summary: Joe Biden on Friday in an ABC News interview refused to commit to an independent medical exam to reassure the public of his mental fitness, even as he insisted he has the stamina to serve another four years.

title: As NATO Turns 75, US Elections And Ukraine Remain Key Focus
content: NATO's 75th-anniversary summit was meant to showcase the triumph of a larger, stronger alliance. Instead, leaders are coming together in Washington in the shadow of setbacks in Ukraine and electoral headwinds on both sides of the Atlantic.
summary: NATO's 75th-anniversary summit was meant to showcase the triumph of a larger, stronger alliance. Instead, leaders are coming together in Washington in the shadow of setbacks in Ukraine and electoral headwinds on both sides of the Atlantic.

title: WWE Legend John Cena Announces Retirement After 20 Years In The Ring
content: John Cena, a 16-time WWE Champion, has announced retirement from in-ring competition with effect from 2025. Mr Cena announced his retirement during a surprise appearance at the 'Money in the Bank' event in Toronto today.
summary: John Cena, a 16-time WWE Champion, has announced retirement from in-ring competition with effect from 2025. Mr Cena announced his retirement during a surprise appearance at the 'Money in the Bank' event in Toronto today.
